^\Q.github/workflows/spelling.yml\E$
^\Qetc/relicense/contributors.txt\E$
^\Qetc/relicense/relicense_comments.txt\E$
^\Qtests/ui-cargo/cargo_rust_version/fail_both_diff/clippy.toml\E$
^\Qtests/ui-cargo/cargo_rust_version/fail_both_same/clippy.toml\E$

^\Qtests/ui-toml/large_include_file/too_big.txt\E$

^\Qtests/workspace_test/subcrate/src/lib.rs\E$
